v.v: This is the word of Yahweh that came to Jeremiah the prophet concerning the Philistines. This word came to him before Pharaoh attacked Gaza.
“Yahweh says this: See, floods of water are rising in the north. They will be like an overflowing river!
At the sound of the stamping of their strong horses’ hooves,
For the day is coming that will devastate all of the Philistines, to cut off from Tyre and Sidon
Baldness will come upon Gaza. As for Ashkelon, the people who are left in their valley will be made silent.
Woe, sword of Yahweh! How long will it be until you become silent?
How can it rest when Yahweh has commanded it,

v: Then they will overflow the land and everything in it, its cities and its inhabitants! So everyone will shout for help,
and all the inhabitants of the land will lament.
at the roar of their chariots and the noise of their wheels,
fathers will not help their children because of their own weakness.
every survivor who wants to help them. For Yahweh is devastating the Philistines,
those who remain from the island of Caphtor.
How long will you cut yourself in mourning?
Go back to your scabbard! Stop and be silent.
when he has ordered it to attack Ashkelon and the coastlands along the sea?”
